content: materials - 4 skeins of purl soho s season alpaca 1 100% baby alpaca each skein is approximately 218 yards/ 100 grams approximately 850 yards required we used the color trout brown - us f 4 0 mm crochet hook 2 gauge - unblocked 20 double crochets = 4 inches - blocked 19 double crochets = 4 inches size finished dimensions 11½ inches wide x 72 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/season-alpaca html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23805
